message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll give you a slightly lower offer, but it's still a good deal. Your turn to decide!
You're trying to take advantage of me! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away the farm.
I'm not giving in yet. I'll try to make a better offer. Your turn to decide!
You're not budging, I'm not either. I'll meet you in the middle again.
